text: Masayuki Dobashi(土橋 正幸, 5 Dec 1935 - 24 Aug 2013) was a baseball player and manager in Japan. As a pitcher he won over 162 games. He played in the Pacific League for the Toei Flyers. He died from ALS. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Baseball people from Tokyo Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Toei Flyers players Category:Managers of baseball teams in Japan Category:Hokkaido Nippon-Ham Fighters managers Category:Tokyo Yakult Swallows managers Category:Deaths from motor neuron disease
title: Masayuki Dobashi
